form.name: complementary_feeding_for_children_12_to_less_than_24_months_of_age
form.page_subtitle: CWC Counselling: Feeding A Healthy Child > Complementary Feeding For Children 12 – < 24 MONTHS OF AGE

field.name: Continue breastfeeding your child on demand both day and night, breastmilk continues to be the most important part of your child’s diet
Breastmilk continues to make up one-third of young child’s energy needs from 12 – < 24 months of age
To help your child to grow strong and breastfeed, you should use a family planning method to prevent another pregnancy
